Articles.Content:
So, recently got back on KSP after 1.1.3, updated all my mods, and then this happened:

Launch clamps... are kinda broken right now.

Anyone seen this before, and know how to fix it short of a completely fresh install?

I'm not quite sure what you see as being so broken about them? Instead of going all the way down into the floor, now they are floating? Is that it? Do they work anyway on the pad? I think the important question is what happens with them on the pad, not in the VAB.
Yeah, they don't work on the pad. They don't release from the rocket, either.

Remove all your mods. Does it still happen?

- Yes: your KSP install got borked in the upgrade. Delete it and redownload.
- No: One of your mods screwed it up. You'll need to find out which one.

Well, I have a vanilla install -- and my launch clamps reach all the way to the floor. They also have a different symbol in my staging than in yours. And they work on the pad. So I'm betting that one of your mods messed it up. So as Streetwind says, try the whole "undo the mods one-by-one" deal, and if that doesn't fix it then your main game is corrupted.
